title: Crowning the Volcano: Phil Gaimon Sets New KOM on Hawaii’s Haleakala Climb
content:
Gaimon set a new record on "the world's longest paved climb" on Maui in 2:23:36, just 28 seconds ahead of the previous fastest time.

Read the full article at Crowning the Volcano: Phil Gaimon Sets New KOM on Hawaii’s Haleakala Climb on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
